description: Test fixture for Ralph orchestrator with fullstack project

tasks.title: Add API endpoint for version
tasks.description: Add a /version endpoint to the API that returns the app version.
acceptanceCriteria: Endpoint returns JSON with version field

tasks.title: Add tests for version endpoint
tasks.description: Add tests for the version endpoint.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `python -m pytest tests/ -k version` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Add version display to frontend
tasks.description: Display the API version in the frontend App component.
